name: Ext_R5_Condition_clinicalStatus
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Condition.clinicalStatus for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Condition.clinicalStatus from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Condition|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: active | recurrence | relapse | inactive | remission | resolved | unknown
element.definition: The clinical status of the condition.
element.comment: `Condition.clinicalStatus` maps to R4B `Condition.clinicalStatus`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a non-`code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
element.isModifierReason: This element is labeled as a modifier because the status contains codes that mark the condition as no longer active.
